## Checklist

Please ensure your PR meets the following requirements:

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] The tool is relevant for content creators
- [ ] The link is working and points to the correct resource
- [ ] The description is concise and ends with a period
- [ ] The entry is placed in the correct category
- [ ] I am not affiliated with the tool (or I have disclosed the affiliation)
